name: Color Space (PabloWilson)
description:
Fly through the color space! You command  a glorious ship impervious to damage, but it can only prevent damage of the same color... Use WASD to fly, Left click to shoot, and Right click to change colors. When you're blue, you can kill red enemies! When you're red you can kill blue enemies! But watch out, they can hurt you too...

Can you eliminate all your foes and unite the Color Space?
